parameters.name: usefile
parameters.description: File containing subset of problems to use.  set to 0 for full set controlled by other parameters.

parameters.name: trialspersize
parameters.description: If usefile is 0, selects number of trials per length. Choose up to 15

parameters.name: chooserandomtrials
parameters.description: If usefile is 0, whether to choose random trials or the first N

parameters.name: doflash
parameters.description: should the circle flash when you click it?  Good for touchscreen, where finger covers the circle and you still want feedback.

parameters.name: dobeep
parameters.description: Should a click play when clicks made?

parameters.name: randomstart
parameters.description: Should we choose a random starting node for each problem?
